name: nog-error-codes
description: Nog error specs that are used by multiple packages

scripts.test-watch: echo >&2 'nog-error-codes has no unit tests.' && exit 0 && cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)"/web/apps/packages-testapp && npm run test-packages-watch-nog-error-codes
scripts.test-headless: echo >&2 'nog-error-codes has no unit tests.' && exit 0 && cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)"/web/apps/packages-testapp && npm run test-packages-headless-nog-error-codes

author: Steffen Prohaska <prohaska@zib.de>
//: See toplevel package.json for ESLint dependencies
